review: We visited the doctor while experiencing fever and indigestion. However, the sheer amount of medicines that was prescribed was overwhelming considering the symptoms. We were recommended 10 separate medicines with consumption of 2/3 times a day each! Further, he had clearly recommended bery expensive alternatives to generic consumables like probiotic. Would not recommend at all.
reply_text: Hi, I understand that you had fever and indigestion. But that's symptoms. That's not a diagnosis. Treatment is based on diagnosis not on symptoms alone. It is not like 1 tablet per symptom. So counting number of tablets doesn't help if you don't understand why they are being prescribed. So before coming to a social media had you asked relevant questions and doubts about the medication and diagnosis it would have been better. The brands of medicine recommended were generic brands too but there is no compulsion to buy that brand only. You can choose alternative brands. Again you could have asked for alternative brands if required. It would be better in future if you clarify these things with your treating doctor.

review: Initially I thought the doctor is really good, considering his profile on Practo. I had an appointment at 5, reached at the same time. THE SHUTTER OF HIS CLINIC WAS CLOSED. I had a patient with me, who was so dehydrated that he could barely walk. It was such a difficult task to take him out of the house to see a doctor in the first place. When I called the doctor, he just said “HE IS BUSY WITH A PATIENT” and hung up. I mean, it lies in human courtesy to inform if you aren’t available at a particular time. * ***** **** **** ** ***** ******* **** ********** ******* ** ****** * **********
reply_text:
Hi Sabia,
I am extremely sorry for the inconvenience caused to you. I regret for the problem  but as a doctor sometimes there are emergencies which are not planned. One patient had come to the ICU at that time and I had to rush there. When I spoke to you I told you clearly regarding the emergency and requested you to reschedule it at 5.45 pm. You said yes and I thought it was fine. My assistant had also tried to call you in the afternoon to reschedule the appointment but could not get through to you. I understand the diffulties faced but sometimes I need to prioritise my patients in a given situation. I still regret the inconvenience caused.

review:
I visited him for my back ache, at first he asked me to go for all ******** blood tests ****** *********** ** *** ***** and a MRI (LS spine)for which he asked me to go to his refereed MRI diagnostic centre only which was charging an exorbitant amount, way higher than the other reputed MRI diagnostic centres in South Delhi.
Next thing to be noted here is that when I visited Dr. Ray’s clinic I was told that if I visit him within five days of the first consultation I would be charged nothing however to my utter disappointment when I duly visited him on the fifth day itself they again charged me with 700 consultation fee which was supposed to be free.In the end, I would not recommend this doctor to anyone for any treatment.. Highly unprofessional and dissatisfied...
reply_text:
Hi, I am surprised and dissapointed by your allegations. The causes of backache are several and so to eliminate systemic problems certain tests are required. Regarding diagnostic centre it was a suggestion only as it was nearby but cost is completely dependent on the diagnostic centre. Also if you felt it was expensive there was no compulsion to get test done from the place. You are always free to choose any diagnostic centre of your own choice.
          As far consultation fees it is a structured thing that is followed for every patient. Your first consultation was on 1st August and next on 6th August. I charge consultation fees again on the fifth day. If you had any problem with it you should have enquired or told me at that time. We could have easily settled the issue. Still if there was any error in calculating the days from my staff, I am sorry but otherwise it is a norm for every patient. 
           I am sorry that you had a bad experience but we wish that you had expressed your concern at that time so that any misunderstanding could have been easily resolved.

review: Dr.Roy was both attentive and patient.He took note of my allergy to antibiotics.I did not take the antiviral tablets he prescribed but opted for the two other antibiotics he prescribed.I was a little surprised that he did not request for a feedback.It would definitely lead  to building up trust between the physician and a Senior Citizen.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback. We believe that if you are satisfied you will automatically give feedback. It is encouraging to get your support as it provides us the zeal and enthusiasm to deal with our patients.

review: I had heard a lot about Dr. Roy but i was disappointed to meet him. Even though the covid cases at that time were only 50-60 he refused to do a physical check up and was seated almost 10 ft apart with a plastic sheet between himself and the patient's chair. * **** ** ** *** ** ****** ** *********** ****** ** ****** **** ******* ** ****** ******** He asked me for get  tests done ***** * ***** *** **** ******* *********** **** * ********* ******* *******I dont recommend him at all
reply_text: Hi, sorry to know that you were disappointed. But more amused to know that after 2 years of pandemic the essence of prevention hasn't yet dawned upon us. Clinic is a place where symptomatic, infected and non infected cases come. The physical barrier is to screen and  understand the problems before examining to be able to segregate the infected from non infected patients. Covid appropriate behaviour shouldn't be tagged as 'scared', it shows lack of awareness. Anyway I don't remember the details of tests but I guess it is a matter of opinion regarding what is necessary and what isn't. Anyway I am sorry if you  found it unnecessary but I recommend what is generally necessary.

review: Dr . Sanchayan is a very kind * ************* ****** * Very patiently he listens to your problem . I m so thankful to Dr for treating me so well with my allergic and asthama problem . He responce at once in need . Thank you so much Dr. Sanchayan for always listening patiently n responding to my queries & treating very well .
reply_text: Thanks for your encouragement and support.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Roy was very patient, helpful, and understanding. I asked him questions, and he gave me an explanatory answer for each query, which was very reassuring. He’s very approachable, every time I am worried about new medication or some after-effects I’m experiencing. I appreciate a doctor who gets me feeling ok, ******* ********* *********** ***** ** **********
reply_text: Thanks for your encouraging and gratifying words.

review:
**** ***** *** *** ** * **** ******* The treatment more or less was fine. I’ve seen him at multiple clinics , and every single time (this is the 5th time) , the appointment has to be rescheduled or there’s an immense wait. I understand, doctors are busy, you have patients to attend to - but when it happens 5 times in a row that you’re rescheduling  (in advance) then there’s clearly an issue. 

In addition to that, there are multiple minor issues that have added up. Because of a misspelt name and incorrect date on a prescription (by the doctor) I had to argue at the pharmacy for more than 30 minutes to get medications.

Again, no real problems with Dr. Roy. But if you’re a busy person, or you have scheduling problems , I can’t recommend him.  You almost certainly will not get to actually get your appointment on time.
reply_text:
Hi, sad to know about your inconvenience. I apologise for any issue from our side. But having said that these are minor issues which could be resolved by direct communication. Rescheduling of timings is necessary often in this pandemic times due to changed hospital scenarios. If a critical patient has a problem then my priority is first with them ( in the hospital). We have informed you in advance so as to prevent any inconveniences. 
        But nevertheless we will try to look into these issues and solve them as best as possible.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Sir is not a diabatician however he saved my life.My report was 416 fasting and after food 636which was a very big reason to worry for me. I have seen my parents crying as I was also diagnosed with fatty liver level 2 as well.Dr Sanchayan Sir saved my life by his guidance and regular follow ups by us at his clinic.I can say that in a month time not only me but also my family has seen a drastic change in my health.I would like to thank Sir for his guidance and help and also will followup till I resume normal life.
reply_text: Thanks for your encouraging words. Wish you a very healthy and happy life.

review:
I visited Dr. Sanchayan for Dengue fever treatment. He listened very patiently and seems very knowledgeable on subject. He also seems to follow standard protocals on treatment which is great to know. 

Keep doing the good work.
reply_text: Thanks for understanding and acknowledging the concepts.

review: I have been going to Dr Sanchayan for more than a year. He has treated my typhoid which i got last year, different vitamin deficiency and issues with sleep quite well. Highly recommended. I live in karol bagh but travel to cr park because his medicines suit me well and he is in general very attentive and patient.

reply_text: Thanks for your feedback. I hope you are much better  now.

review: Doctor was late and did not apologise for making us wait. Did not engage with the patient to understand and explain the concerns. Very low on energy.
reply_text: If you are talking related to treatment you need to express issues with treatment or diagnosis. I am sorry if you felt that way but sometimes emergencies in the hospital can be a priority over clinic patients. If you had any concern related to your treatment which you felt wasn't addressed you could have asked more queries regarding it. Talking about diagnosis, treatment and related issues directly would have been a better idea. Still we are sorry if we have not been able to  fulfill your expectations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Roy is so  friendly that patient is feeling at ease to describe the ailment . Not too much medication also a relief to the patient .
reply_text: Thanks for your positive words. They are an inspiration for us to work harder for our patients.
